sections.title: Education
sections.content:
2019 Puppet theatre and musical theatre specializing program (Novia University of applied sciences / Turku University of applied sciences)

2006 Muusikko AMK, Lahti University of applied sciences (musical theatre)

1999-2000 Musical theatre program, Varsinais-Suomi folk high school

1999 High school graduate, Mänttä High School

sections.title: Work experience
sections.content: Musical artist since 2002. Dubbing cartoons and being a voice artist since 2004. Voice director since 2020.

sections.title: Taidot
sections.content:
Acting, singing, playing the violin, dancing

Finnish, English, Swedish

sections.title: Significant roles
sections.content:
Fru Brill, Fru Corry (Mary Poppins, Svenska Theatre) 2020

Louhi (Kalevala, Åbo Svenska Theatre) 2019

Ester / violinist (Ingvar! En musikalisk Möbelsaga, Wasa Theatre) 2017

Éponine (Les Misérables, Tampere Theatre) 2013

Georgie Bugatinsky (Full Monty, Samppalinna Summer Theatre) 2012

Linda (Blood Brothers, Tampere Theatre) 2012
